text: Calliotropis abyssicola is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== It can have a shell size of up to 10mm. ==Distribution== It can be found in the Mid-Pacific Seamounts between the Marshall Islands and Hawaii. ==References== * Rehder H. A. & Ladd H. S. (1973) Deep and shallow-water mollusks from the Central Pacific. Science Reports of the Tohoku University, Sendai, ser. 2 (Geology) Special vol. 6 (Hatai Memorial Volume): 37–49, pl. 3. page(s): 44 * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72. ==External links== * abyssicola Category:Gastropods described in 1973
title: Calliotropis abyssicola
